items.sentence: You don\'t really want me to go there alone, do you?
You don\'t seem to be as unlucky as Tom seems to be.
You don\'t seem to be as worried as Tom seems to be.
I don\'t have enough money to buy everything I need.
I don\'t know anybody who does that better than you.
You can have any three of these books that you want.
I\'ve got to find something to do with my free time.
Does Tom still think he\'ll be in Boston all summer?
You\'re the only person I know who can speak French.
You\'ve got to get this done before you can go home.
Why didn\'t you ever tell me how you felt about Tom?
If you ever do anything to hurt Tom, I\'ll kill you.
I told Tom not to wait for more than thirty minutes.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom didn\'t tell me the truth.
We\'re trying to find somebody who can speak French.
I\'ll need to be in Boston for at least three weeks.
We\'re waiting for Tom to tell us it\'s OK to begin.
My wife and I prefer to spend time at home together.
Only a few people here know that Tom is from Boston.
At the time of his arrest, Tom was living in Boston.
